      • submit

        public void submit(java.lang.String applicationName,
                   java.lang.String jsonConfig)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceMXBean
        Submit an application registered with the application service.
        Specified by:
        submit in interface ApplicationServiceMXBean
        Parameters:
        applicationName - Name of the application.
        jsonConfig - JSON configuration serialized as a String. Null or an empty String is equivalent to an empty JSON object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error submitting application.
        See Also:
        ApplicationService

      • registerJar

        public void registerJar(java.lang.String jarURL,
                        java.lang.String jsonConfig)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceMXBean
        Register a jar file containing applications with the application service. Any service providers in the jar of type TopologyBuilder will be registered as applications.
        Specified by:
        registerJar in interface ApplicationServiceMXBean
        Parameters:
        jarURL - URL for the jar file.
        jsonConfig - JSON configuration serialized as a String (currently unused).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error registering jar.
        See Also:
        ApplicationService, TopologyBuilder
